Detailed Description

The IObserver interface supplies loosely coupling systems with dependency It facilitates a lazy behaviour where by systems only need to react to a change and facilitates dependent callback threading.

Related interfaces:
ISubject
IObserver

This interface follows the pattern commonly know as the Observer pattern, the Publish/Subscribe pattern, or the Dependents pattern.

The Observer pattern is documented in "Design Patterns," written by Erich Gamma et. al., published by Addison-Wesley in 1995.

Member Function Documentation

virtual Error Interface::IChangeManager::Register ( ISubject *  pInSubject,
u32  uInIntrestBits,
IObserver *  pInObserver,
System::Types::BitMask  observerIdBits = System::Types::All 
) [pure virtual]

Associates the provided IObserver with the given ISubject aspects of interest.

Parameters:
pInSubject A pointer to the ISubject.
uInIntrestBits The aspects of interest that changed as defined by the supplied ISubject's published interest bits..
pInObserver A pointer to the IObserver.
observerIdBits Bitmask of the interest bits. (default = System::Types::All)
Returns:
One of the following Error codes: Error::Success No error. Error::InvalidAddress pInObserver and/or pInSubject was NULL. Error::OutOfMemory Not enough memory is available to resolve the change. /returns>

virtual Error Interface::IChangeManager::Unregister ( ISubject *  pInSubject,
IObserver *  pInObserver 
) [pure virtual]

Disassociates the provided IObserver from the supplied ISubject.

Parameters:
pInSubject A pointer to the ISubject.
pInObserver A pointer to the IObserver.
Returns:
One of the following Error codes: Error::Success No error. Error::InvalidAddress pInObserver and/or pInSubject was NULL. /returns>

virtual Error Interface::IChangeManager::DistributeQueuedChanges ( System::Types::BitMask  systems2BeNotified = System::Types::All,
System::Changes::BitMask  ChangesToDist = System::Changes::All 
) [pure virtual]

Distributes the queued changes..

Intended to be called after all ISubject's have changed state to deliver relevant queued change notifications to registered IObservers via. IObserver::Update().

Returns:
One of the following Error codes: Error::Success No error. Error::InvalidAddress pInObserver and/or pInSubject was NULL. Error::OutOfMemory Not enough memory is available to resolve the change. /returns>
